# File lib/add_captcha_to_action_view.rb, line 20
                        def captcha_image_tag(c, options = {})
                                c.generate(options)
                                c.write

                                image_tag(
                                        c.file_path,
                                        {
                                                :size => "#{c.image.columns}x#{c.image.rows}"
                                        }.update(options)
                                )
                        end
